Detailed Description

Definition at line 44 of file ByteArrayOutputStream.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::ByteArrayOutputStream ( )

Constructs a new ByteArrayOutputStream with a default size of 32 bytes.

If more than 32 bytes are written to this instance, the underlying byte array will expand.

gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::ByteArrayOutputStream ( int32_t  size) [explicit]

Constructs a new ByteArrayOutputStream with a default size of size bytes.

If more than size bytes are written to this instance, the underlying byte array will expand.

Parameters:
sizeinitial size for the underlying byte array, must be non-negative.
virtual gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::~ByteArrayOutputStream ( ) [virtual]

ByteArrayOutputStream Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::close ( ) [virtual]

Closes this stream.

This releases system resources used for this stream.

Reimplemented from gaia::storage::OutputStream.

void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::reset ( )

Resets this stream to the beginning of the underlying byte array.

All subsequent writes will overwrite any bytes previously stored in this stream.

int32_t gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::size ( )

Returns the total number of bytes written to this stream so far.

Returns:
the number of bytes written to this stream.
base::ByteArray gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::toByteArray ( )

Returns the contents of this ByteArrayOutputStream as a byte array.

Any changes made to the receiver after returning will not be reflected in the byte array returned to the caller.

Returns:
this stream's current contents as a byte array.
base::String gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::toString ( )

Returns the contents of this ByteArrayOutputStream as a string.

Any changes made to the receiver after returning will not be reflected in the string returned to the caller.

Returns:
this stream's current contents as a string.
